summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Coach/Client roles and global state management for the Moove platform. All role-based access control features are working correctly, including registration flows, dashboard protection, toast notifications, and Zustand state persistence.

ui_bugs.issue: Toast close button functionality not working properly - toasts don't close when X button is clicked

passed_tests: Coach registration at /register?type=coach creates user with role='coach'
Member registration at /register creates user with role='member'
Coach can access /dashboard after registration and is redirected there automatically
Member is redirected to home with warning toast when accessing /dashboard
Global toast notifications appear correctly for role-based access denial
Warning toast has correct yellow styling and positioning
Zustand store persists user data across page refreshes
Coach state persistence works correctly after page reload
Member role is correctly stored in localStorage
Coach role is correctly stored in localStorage with brand information
Registration form validation works (terms acceptance required)
Brand slug auto-generation works for coach registration
Role-based routing protection works in AuthContext
Dashboard layout correctly checks for coach role
GlobalToast component is properly integrated in MainLayout
Toast container has correct positioning (fixed bottom-4 right-4)
Success toasts appear after successful registration
Member/Coach toggle tabs work correctly on registration page
Coach-specific fields (Brand Name, Brand URL) appear only for coach registration
Login flow simulation works - re-registration maintains role behavior
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider fixing the toast close button functionality - currently the X button doesn't properly close toasts when clicked. The auto-dismiss after 4 seconds works correctly, but manual close doesn't work.
